#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,sum;cin>>t;
    char s[100001];
    while(t--)
    {sum=0;
   scanf("%s",&s);
  // cin.ignore();
   for(int i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
   {
    if(s[i]=='T')
    sum+=1;
    else
    sum-=1;
   //  cout<<sum<<" ";
    if(sum==-1)
     break;
   }       
   if(sum==0) 
   cout<<"YES"<<"\n";  
   else
   cout<<"NO"<<"\n"   ;
   }
}
